generator: color(1..N) :- N = #count { X : node(X) }. edge(V,U) :- edge(U,V). { assign(N,C) : color(C) } = 1 :- node(N).

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check to make sure adjacent nodes don't end up with the same color.

soft_constraints.description: We need to track which colors are actually being used so we can minimize that count.

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Tag, ID : penalty(Tag, ID, Cost) }.
